EmoMemory FREE Registration Code

In 15 Dec, 2011 the EmoMemory game became free!

Just paste this registration code at the game's Registration screen:

FREEGAME:D535DA

Your code will be validated and your game will be fully unlocked, with no expiration date.

Enjoy!
